name: Arkillery | Super Duper War
description:
It is a local multiplayer game where every 5 seconds random weapons will drop and you have 2 options, use or recycle it to make a more powerful weapon, to finish your opponent!

CONTROLS

PLAYER 1: "WASD" to Move | "J" to Shot | "K" to Recycle Item on white area

PLAYER 2: Arrows to Move | "0" to Shot | "," to Recycle Item on white area

ITEMS

Pistol, Spear, Portal, Beans, Mine, Barrier.

Powerful Weapons

Shotgun, Hurricane, Beast.
